name: How Iâ€™m using the fragments of social media now - Andy Bell
summary: It’s been over a year since Elon Musk started the process of dismantling Twitter, which has resulted in lots of fragmentation. It’s also resulted in new platforms arriving and some even disappearing (cya later T2/Pebble). I think I’ve found the perfect balance, which I guess is an evolution of the holy trinity. Mastodon For work […]
